verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> and Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korah. <WH7141> Great <WH1419> is the LORD, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> in the city <WH5892> of our God, <WH430> in the mountain <WH2022> of his holiness. <WH6944>

Beautiful <WH3303> for situation, <WH5131> the joy <WH4885> of the whole <WH3605> earth, <WH776> is mount <WH2022> Zion, <WH6726> on the sides <WH3411> of the north, <WH6828> the city <WH7151> of the great <WH7227> King. <WH4428>
God <WH430> is known <WH3045> in her palaces <WH759> for a refuge. <WH4869>
For, see, <WH2009> the kings <WH4428> were assembled, <WH3259> they passed <WH5674> by together. <WH3162>
They saw <WH7200> it, and so <WH3651> they marveled; <WH8539> they were troubled, <WH926> and hurried <WH2648> away.
Fear <WH7461> took hold <WH270> on them there, <WH8033> and pain, <WH2427> as of a woman in travail. <WH3205>
You break <WH7665> the ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659> with an east <WH6921> wind. <WH7307>

As we have heard, <WH8085> so <WH3651> have we seen <WH7200> in the city <WH5892> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> in the city <WH5892> of our God: <WH430> God <WH430> will establish <WH3559> it for ever. <WH5769> Selah. <WH5542>
We have thought <WH1819> of your loving kindness, <WH2617> O God, <WH430> in the middle <WH7130> of your temple. <WH1964>

According to your name, <WH8034> O God, <WH430> so <WH3651> is your praise <WH8416> to the ends <WH7099> of the earth: <WH776> your right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> is full <WH4390> of righteousness. <WH6664>
Let mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> rejoice, <WH8055> let the daughters <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063> be glad, <WH1523> because <WH4616> of your judgments. <WH4941>
Walk <WH5437> about <WH5439> Zion, <WH6726> and go <WH5362> round <WH5362> about her: tell <WH5608> the towers <WH4026> thereof.
Mark <WH7896> you well her bulwarks, <WH2430> consider <WH6448> her palaces; <WH759> that you may tell <WH5608> it to the generation <WH1755> following. <WH314>
For this <WH2088> God <WH430> is our God <WH430> for ever <WH5703> and ever: <WH5703> he will be our guide <WH5090> even to death. <WH4192>
